e3d0abe7-4bd8-403c-83fb-695429ba53e7.description: Offered by the SUNY SAIL Institute, the Department Chair Academy is an intensive experience for higher education leaders. The Academy provides an enriching and engaging experience designed to prepare department and program chairs to be effective leaders, creative managers, champions of student success, and supporters of faculty development.
e3d0abe7-4bd8-403c-83fb-695429ba53e7.name: Department Chair Academy

d2336397-adc0-4980-b44f-39e33801722d.description: Through a series of live learning events hosted by SUNY SAIL Institute, leaders were empowered to envision, align, and execute necessary change efforts. Participants gained awareness, skills and mindsets to lead successful change initiatives at their institutions to meet students' needs.
d2336397-adc0-4980-b44f-39e33801722d.name: Resilient Change Leader

badge_template_activities.title: Resilient Change Leaders explored topics of resilient change in the following five live, interactive learning events: Setting the Stage; A Conversation with the Chancellor; Building Academic Leadership Capacity; Engaging Students Successfully; and Defining Academia's Future through Inclusive Leadership.

80d9ec41-d5c4-4634-b698-fd9e55b18f40.description: Graduates of the Executive Leadership Academy interacted with experts from the executive search firm Isaacson Miller, as well as with campus presidents and system leaders. Graduates were able to learn about enrollment management, fundraising, budget & finance, diversity& inclusion and strategic communications.
80d9ec41-d5c4-4634-b698-fd9e55b18f40.name: Executive Leadership Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Executive Leadership Academy must fulfill all course requirements.

cd737bec-efc2-45ad-b02d-ea0a49edacaa.description: Graduates of the CIO Leadership Academy understand their personal leadership style and its impact on others, can effectively use communication and relationship-building skills, lead and develop teams within complex organizations, identify new and future challenges confronting CIOs and develop proactive action plans, and create a unifying vision for their organizations and learn strategies to collaborate across organizational silos.
cd737bec-efc2-45ad-b02d-ea0a49edacaa.name: CIO Leadership Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the CIO Leadership Academy must work in the IT space on their campus and participate in program kick-off event, three virtual growth sessions, and present an applied learning project at the capstone event.

b5a6e3d5-5dec-4491-a5f3-e461d3e19345.description: Graduates of the SUNY Student Leadership Academy were able to: Have a better understanding of their own culture and identities as they relate to their peers, community, and the world; Expand their personal and professional network, both locally and globally; flex skills of storytelling and articulate their story to future hiring managers.
b5a6e3d5-5dec-4491-a5f3-e461d3e19345.name: Student Leadership Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the SUNY Student Leadership Academy participated in and completed post-seminar evaluations for at least six of the seven offered seminars in the program. Topics included: Setting Yourself Up for Success in College, Knowing Yourself to Lead Others, The Power of Mentoring, Mentoring check-in and Networking, Articulating your Story to Open the Door to Your Future, Working with Diverse Teams: Cultural Intelligence to Include Others and Program Reflections.

ce2035a5-1b52-46ed-85b6-a47ef4c5765a.description: SUNY’s Global Leader Experience is an intensive leadership development program that exposes students to civic-leadership-based curriculum, complemented by applied learning opportunities taught from a global perspective. Common Purpose provided students with access visionary leaders in multiple fields who offered unique insights that supported students' academic and professional advancement. Students can now exemplify competence in cross-boundary leadership, teamwork and cultural intelligence.
ce2035a5-1b52-46ed-85b6-a47ef4c5765a.name: Global Leader Experience 2019

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Global Leader Experience must participate In Common Purpose's leadership development curriculum and answer a unique challenge question with a team project and present to student cohort.

eb9767ea-13e9-4282-83eb-8ef10f6c3f6f.description: Graduates of the SUNY Student Leadership Academy were able to: Have a better understanding of their own culture and identities as they relate to your peers, community, and the world; Expand their personal and professional network; and, Learn and flex skills of storytelling to be able articulate their story to open doors to their future.
eb9767ea-13e9-4282-83eb-8ef10f6c3f6f.name: Student Leadership Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the SUNY Student Leadership Academy participated in and completed post-seminar evaluations for at least six of the seven offered seminars in the program. Topics included: Setting Yourself Up for Success in College, Knowing Yourself to Lead Others, The Power of Mentoring, Communicating with Impact, Creating Inclusive Environments as a student leader, Managing people responsibly: Creating Cultures of Accountability for Yourself and Others and Program Reflections.

89ce8a1a-35ef-476d-bbad-8f107f5a9a0d.description: The summer program is a week-long retreat to enhance the leadership skills of the participants, making them more effective managers on their campuses and preparing them to take on more leadership responsibilities within SUNY in the future. Participants focused on discovering leadership (defining what leadership is, especially for oneself), and developing and applying skills around four broad areas of leadership experience: personal, interpersonal, teamand system mastery.
89ce8a1a-35ef-476d-bbad-8f107f5a9a0d.name: Summer Leadership Retreat

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Summer Leadership Retreat must participate in this week-long retreat to enhance their leadership skills through workshops, group-discussions, lectures and networking.

27748b58-e5c0-469a-bc35-a6e2a24fa520.description: The SUNY SAIL Institute offers the Clinical Leadership Academy to support physicians to physician leaders. By actively engaging this intensive academy, physicians have developed the knowledge and skills needed to effectively lead their academic medical centers.
27748b58-e5c0-469a-bc35-a6e2a24fa520.name: Clinical Leadership Academy

badge_template_activities.title: This badge has been awarded to those who have completed the eight-month Clinical Leadership Academy and successfully presented an applied learning project applying skills learned throughout the experience.

skills.name: Diversity And Inclusion For Healthcare Leaders

7e777e41-fcd7-4697-8f3b-ad22d3e9e666.description: SUNY SAIL’s Mindful Leadership courses explore how meditation, reflection, communication and other contemplative practices impact the development of the fundamental qualities of living and leading well.
7e777e41-fcd7-4697-8f3b-ad22d3e9e666.name: Mindful Leader with Distinction

badge_template_activities.title: Mindful Leaders have cultivated their leadership presence by completing three online courses: Foundations of Mindfulness and Meditation, Mindful Communication, Mindful Resilience.
This digital badge was earned with distinction by demonstrating an application of their learning experience on their campus.

a349a598-3e4a-4741-b8b4-6cbeaa174225.description: Earners of the Inclusive Citizen Leader badge explored the factors to develop solid leadership and citizenship skills in higher education in order to empower themselves and students.
a349a598-3e4a-4741-b8b4-6cbeaa174225.name: Inclusive Citizen Leader

badge_template_activities.title: Inclusive Citizen Leaders collaboratively explored foundational topics of inclusive citizenship in at least three out of five interactive webinars: Civility & Shifting Paradigms, Integrity & Ethics, Inclusive Mindsets, Mindful Resilience, and Empowering Students to Lead by Example and Take Us into the New Normal.

8f68b18f-38c0-4fa1-875e-fa5df2a0addd.description: Participants in the 2020 Winter Leadership Retreat are equipped to Lead Culturally Intelligent and Inclusive Campuses. Participants spent three days expanding on their ability to understand themselves as leaders in the Higher Education context, make meaningful change on campus, and shift their mindset to lead high performing teams and students to success.
8f68b18f-38c0-4fa1-875e-fa5df2a0addd.name: 2020 Winter Leadership Retreat

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the "2020 Winter Leadership Retreat: Leading Culturally Intelligent and Inclusive Campuses," must spend three days expanding on their ability to understand themselves as leaders, lead in the Higher Education context, make meaningful change on campus, as well as shift their mindset to lead high performing teams and students to success.

e39f0456-117b-483b-8f77-b14f95c55b32.description: This program supports participants through self-discovery, skill development, and knowledge creation. The program uses a variety of leadership assessments, small group and panel discussions, case studies, and simulations, all situated within the context in which the modern higher education business officer exists. Each participant, with the guidance of a mentor, creates a plan to lead a project or implementation of an initiative on their campus, and presents the plan to the cohort.
e39f0456-117b-483b-8f77-b14f95c55b32.name: Business Officers' Leadership Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Leadership Academy work in the business and financial management space on their campus and must fully participate in the virtual growth sessions, and present an applied learning project at the capstone event.

999015e5-611d-49bf-9779-cfbc681b2468.description: Graduates of the SUNY Student Leadership Academy were able to: Have a better understanding of their own culture and identities as they relate to their peers, community, and the world; Expand their personal and professional network; and, Learn and flex skills of storytelling to be able articulate their story to open doors to their future.
999015e5-611d-49bf-9779-cfbc681b2468.name: SUNY Student Leadership Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the SUNY Student Leadership Academy participated in and completed post-seminar evaluations for at least five of the six offered seminars in the program. Topics included: Setting Yourself Up for Success in College/Mentoring, Know Yourself to Lead Others, Communicating with Impact, Managing People Responsibly: Creating Cultures of Accountability for Yourself and Others, Creating Inclusive Environments as a Student Leader, and Program Reflections.

9ecf2481-5f82-4df8-b10b-60b60a6e6daf.description: Participants in the 2018 Department Chair Summit can now articulate and execute a vision for the future, understand their strengths and weakness as a leader, have a firm understanding of practical management skills, effectively span the boundaries between the faculty and the college administration.
9ecf2481-5f82-4df8-b10b-60b60a6e6daf.name: 2018 Department Chair Summit

badge_template_activities.title: This badge has been awarded to those who completed the 2018 Department Chair Summit.

dd4b68f8-3156-49fd-996b-e326a4177ffa.description: This credit is to establish that the recipient attended and succesfully completed the requirements to be a graduate of the 2019 SUNY SAIL Institute Winter Leadership Retreat. Participants included faculty and administrative staff at institutions of higher education looking to expand their leadership skills over the course of 3 days preparing them to move into or a new role or boost their ability to perform in their current positions.
dd4b68f8-3156-49fd-996b-e326a4177ffa.name: 2019 Winter Leadership Retreat

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Winter Leadership Retreat must participate in this 2.5 day experience that expands leadership skills through workshops, group-discussions, lectures and networking,

f65bf3a0-3127-4fb4-9618-b1a40f78536e.description: Earners of this designation have enhanced leadership skills that make them more effective managers on their campuses and are prepared to take on more leading roles within SUNY in the future. Participants have gained mastery in interpersonal, team, and collaborative dynamics through scholarly readings, thought provoking lectures, and challenging exercises. Now, they can think systemically and lead an organization through a strategic change process in a way that develops commitment and learning.
f65bf3a0-3127-4fb4-9618-b1a40f78536e.name: Summer Leadership Retreat 2019

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Summer Leadership Retreat must participate in this week-long retreat to enhance their leadership skills through workshops, group-discussions, lectures and networking.

fb6a5933-cffe-4350-828d-6878d06d456e.description: This credit is to establish that the recipient successfully completed the requirements to be a graduate of the 2021 SUNY SAIL Institute Winter Leadership Retreat focused on Leading Culturally Intelligent & Inclusive Campuses. Participants included faculty and administrative staff at institutions of higher education looking to expand their leadership skills over the course of two months preparing them to move into or a new role or boost their ability to perform in their current positions.
fb6a5933-cffe-4350-828d-6878d06d456e.name: Winter Leadership Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Winter Leadership Retreat participated in live online growth sessions (six sessions totaling 20 hours and an additional 6-12 independent hours), completed a writing assignment, collaborated with colleagues, and completed an online assessment.

fd86e62f-3a36-4bce-b44d-3027dfb7b58b.description: Faculty and administrative staff at institutions of higher education looking to expand their leadership skills over the course of 2.5 days preparing them to move into or a new role or boost their ability to perform in their current positions.
fd86e62f-3a36-4bce-b44d-3027dfb7b58b.name: Winter Leadership Retreat 2018

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Winter Leadership Retreat must participate in this 2.5 day experience that expands leadership skills through workshops, group-discussions, lectures and networking,

c8cb5b4a-80c4-415f-9ee3-3bbe8a6e5249.description: The SUNY Hispanic Leadership Institute is designed to identify, develop and recruit, and ultimately support, retain and foster the success of Hispanic/Latinx leaders at the University President and President’s Cabinet level (Provosts, Chief Financial Officers, Chief Business Officers, etc.).
c8cb5b4a-80c4-415f-9ee3-3bbe8a6e5249.name: Hispanic Leadership Institute

badge_template_activities.title: SUNY Hispanic Leadership Fellows have succesfully completed an intensive six-month development experience. The Hispanic Leadership Institutes includes individualized guidance in leadership development, perosnal data assessments, coaching, and both in-person and virtual workshops. Recipients have also completed an applied learning project.

24ed8d11-185f-4b27-af3d-c0c106c17283.description: Participants in the 2018 Summer Leadership Retreat can now define leadership as it pertains to themselves, know oneself and how they learn from experience, and communicate and work well with others, particularly in difficult conversations. They have the skills to develop and lead teams towards common goals while promoting a healthy environment and the ability to think systemically and lead an organization through a strategic change process in a way that develops commitment and learning.
24ed8d11-185f-4b27-af3d-c0c106c17283.name: Summer Leadership Retreat

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Summer Leadership Retreat must participate in this week-long retreat to enhance their leadership skills through workshops, group-discussions, lectures and networking.

15e41c23-fca5-45a4-8ce3-1f4aa7fa2a87.description: Participants increased self-awareness around diversity issues, personal leadership style and behavioral impact on others; Improved communication, relationship-building skills for leading and motivating others; Established new experiences in leading/developing teams in complex, multi-cultural organizations; Developed/practiced strategies for leading groups/systems change that promotes a culture of inclusion; and created a learning action plan to improve personal and organizational effectiveness.
15e41c23-fca5-45a4-8ce3-1f4aa7fa2a87.name: Summer Leadership Retreat

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Summer Leadership Program participate in this week-long retreat to enhance their leadership skills through workshops, group discussions, mini-teaches, lectures and networking.

bccdd4a9-7877-4d9b-8d4e-9ffc7262cd58.description: SUNY SAIL’s Mindful Leadership courses explore how meditation, reflection, communication and other contemplative practices impact the development of the fundamental qualities of living and leading well.
bccdd4a9-7877-4d9b-8d4e-9ffc7262cd58.name: Mindful Leader

badge_template_activities.title: Mindful Leaders have cultivated their leadership presence by completing three online courses: Foundations of Mindfulness and Meditation, Mindful Communication, Mindful Resilience.

fa871bc7-5450-4b94-b96e-03e372e7267f.description: This program supports participants through self-discovery, skill development and knowledge creation. The program uses a variety of small group discussions, leadership assessments, panel discussions, case studies, role-playing opportunities and simulations, all situated within the context in which the modern CBO exists. Each participant created a plan to lead the implementation or development of an initiative, project or sub-project on their campus, and presented such plan to the entire cohort.
fa871bc7-5450-4b94-b96e-03e372e7267f.name: Chief Business Officers' Leadership Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the CIO Leadership Academy must work in the business and financial management space on their campus and participate in program kick-off event, three virtual growth sessions, and present an applied learning project at the capstone event.

7f49475b-5ace-499a-83f9-4d3609e438f8.description: Graduates of the 2018 Stony Brook Leadership Academy Fellows Program have learned to create strategies for effectively responding to changes in the higher education landscape, engage in self-awareness, build their team through trust and safety, create a culture of collaboration, lead academic innovation and set expectations and accountability while having the ability to manage conflict in their teams.
7f49475b-5ace-499a-83f9-4d3609e438f8.name: Stony Brook Leadership Academy Fellows Program

badge_template_activities.title: This badge has been awarded to those who have complete the 2018 Stony Brook Leadership Academy Fellows Program.

4ee9420c-a4cc-4965-9842-b28bcd8ae693.description: Recipients of this badge have completed a six-month individualized experience that included guided leadership development, assessments, coaching, and online/in-person workshops. Recipients have also completed an applied learning project.
4ee9420c-a4cc-4965-9842-b28bcd8ae693.name: Hispanic Leadership Institute 2019

badge_template_activities.title: Recipients of this badge have completed a six-month individualized experience that included guided leadership development, assessments, coaching, and online/in-person workshops. Recipients have also completed an applied learning project.

52dfa52b-dfe5-4a37-9afe-8b935b57aeda.description: Hispanic Leadership Institute participants have completed a six-month individualized experience that included guided leadership development, assessments, coaching, and online/in-person workshops. Recipients have also completed an applied learning project.
52dfa52b-dfe5-4a37-9afe-8b935b57aeda.name: Hispanic Leadership Institute

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Hispanic Leadership Institute must complete this six month learning academy and complete the applied learning project.

c65f973c-15e2-4020-aae9-3036f3461ec9.description: Earners of this designation have demonstrated an expanded awareness of international student mobility and the implications for an institution's competitive position as international students pursue various pathways and educational providers. Now, earners can articulate the value proposition for developing holistic approaches to international student recruitment and retention and provide guidance on building the key management and operational elements for developing new enrollment pipelines.
c65f973c-15e2-4020-aae9-3036f3461ec9.name: Expanding Reach: Leveraging Innovative and Entrepreneurial Student Mobility Pathways

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of this workshop must participate in a two-day experience, in which they must garner an expanded awareness of international student mobility and the implications for an institution's competitive position as international students pursue various pathways and educational providers.

c6b0bbd6-4bd8-4161-8c14-888c247602eb.description: Recipients of the CIO Resilient Team Award are able to: Display resilience and the ability to lead in a time of disruption; Effectively display good communication and relationship-building skills across the team; identify and overcome new and future challenges that confront the IT higher education field; develop and execute innovative action plans; and learn and implement strategies to collaborate across organizational silos.
c6b0bbd6-4bd8-4161-8c14-888c247602eb.name: Resilient Team

badge_template_activities.title: This badge has been awarded to those who have completed the CIO Resilient Team course.

815113f7-5ffb-411a-84a3-7efeba4049bf.description: The Aspiring Leader experience enables IT practitioners an opportunity to strengthen their management abilities by gaining new understanding of their personal working styles and knowing when to use different management skills based on the situation. This earner knows how to manage a team, including both unionized and non-unionized environments and has d Developed collaboration skills.
815113f7-5ffb-411a-84a3-7efeba4049bf.name: CIO Leadership Academy Aspiring Leader

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Aspiring Leader-track of the CIO Leadership Academy fulfilled all course requirements.

586436cf-8ab5-4793-b0ba-3709fe219508.description: This course, Making the Case for International Alumni Relations, is designed to meet the professional development needs of both senior and line officials who are directly – or tangentially – responsible for building and sustaining relationships between international students, alumni, and families in efforts to promote internationalism at home and abroad for their university. Earners can now assess readiness to invest in global alumni relations with a refreshed approach and updated toolkit.
586436cf-8ab5-4793-b0ba-3709fe219508.name: Making the case for Global Alumni Relations

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of this course must complete 6 hours of instruction and 6 asynchronus assignments related to building and sustaining relationships between international students, alumni, and families in efforts to promote internationalism at home and abroad for their university.

6cd7f9bf-2df0-4a82-afaf-0da288457473.description: Recipients of the Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Leader Award: Understand the importance of diversity, equity, and inclusion and its impact on creating an inclusive campus environment; articulate the need to advance diversity, equity, and inclusion within their campus community and beyond; Create and implement strategies that help to overcome discriminatory challenges and stereotypes in the IT field; and apply effective strategies for working with and advocating for diverse populations.
6cd7f9bf-2df0-4a82-afaf-0da288457473.name: Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion Leader

badge_template_activities.title: This badge has been awarded to those who have completed the Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion Leader course.

15d9acff-f36d-4a57-9eca-7fa7f91b81ae.description: Recipients of the CIO Resilient Leader Award are able to: Display resilience and the ability to lead in a time of disruption; effectively display good communication and relationship-building skills, identify and overcome new and future challenges confronting the IT higher education field and develop proactive action plans; and create a unifying vision for their organizations and learn strategies to collaborate across organizational silos.
15d9acff-f36d-4a57-9eca-7fa7f91b81ae.name: Resilient Leader

badge_template_activities.title: This badge has been awarded to those who have completed the CIO Resilient Leader course.

c54e4b8f-f9e3-4061-afdc-c4b43c1841d7.description: Offered by the SAIL Institute, the Department Chair Summit is a system-wide, two-day intensive experience for higher education leaders. Summits provides an enriching and engaging experience designed to prepare department chairs to be effective leaders, creative managers, champions of student success, and supporters of faculty development.
c54e4b8f-f9e3-4061-afdc-c4b43c1841d7.name: Department Chair Summit 2019

badge_template_activities.title: Offered by the SAIL Institute, the Department Chair Summit is a system-wide, two-day intensive experience for higher education leaders. Summits provides an enriching and engaging experience designed to prepare department chairs to be effective leaders, creative managers, champions of student success, and supporters of faculty development.

84281242-3e15-42f3-ab2c-21f7dccd50bb.description: Recipients of the DEI Team Award: Understand the importance of diversity, equity, & inclusion and its impact on creating an inclusive campus environment; articulate the need to advance diversity, equity, & inclusion within their campus community and beyond; Create and implement strategies that help to overcome discriminatory challenges and stereotypes in the IT field; and collaborate across organizational silos to apply effective strategies for working with and advocating for diverse populations
84281242-3e15-42f3-ab2c-21f7dccd50bb.name: Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion Team

badge_template_activities.title: This badge has been awarded to those who have completed the Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion Team course.

c4742812-3377-4292-9237-3fbc9bc283ab.description: This intensive, four-day session provided participants with an opportunity to interact with experts from the nationally respected, mission-based executive search firm Isaacson, Miller as well as with campus presidents and system leaders who themselves have advanced to their current positions through repeated promotion. Graduates are now able to provide knowledge in enrollment management, Fundraising, Budget & Finance, Diversity & Inclusion, Strategic Communications
c4742812-3377-4292-9237-3fbc9bc283ab.name: Executive Leadership Academy 2019

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Executive Leadership Academy must participate in an intensive, four-day session that provides participants with an opportunity to interact with experts from an executive search firm, campus presidents and system leaders who themselves have advanced to their current positions through repeated promotion. They will learn about enrollment management, fundraising, budget & finance, diversity and inclusion and strategic communications.

e0c4e2d1-a407-4a80-bcbb-56dbc94efcbf.description: SUNY’s Global Leader Experience is an intensive leadership development program that exposes students to curriculum designed to prepare them to be civic leaders, complemented by customized applied learning opportunities taught from a global perspective. Common Purpose provided students with access to some of the most visionary leaders in their fields who offered unique insights that supported students' academic and professional advancement.
e0c4e2d1-a407-4a80-bcbb-56dbc94efcbf.name: Global Leader Experience

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Global Leader Experience must participate In Common Purpose's leadership development curriculum and answer a unique challenge question with a team project and present to student cohort.
